intro: Everardia montana subsp. duidae, commonly known as the Duidae everardia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and leathery, elliptical leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its botanical features make it an important component of its native ecosystem.
